functions.tag: {skill:{trigger:'to_offhand',id:1s,sid:'field_sword',anchor:1b},raw_json:{content:'["",{"text": "e","font":"island"}," ",{"score":{"name": "@s","objective": "field.c.skill"},"color":"yellow"}]',Slot:['mainhand']},Damage:761,RepairCost:1000,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:'generic.attack_damage',Amount:9d,Slot:'mainhand',Name:'aword',UUID:[I;-1211018,18461,131317,-36922]}, {AttributeName:'generic.attack_speed',Amount:-2.4d,Slot:'mainhand',Name:'aword',UUID:[I;-12018,-18461,138717,-36922]}],display:{Name:'{"text":"结界之剑","italic":false,"bold":true,"color":"dark_purple"}',Lore:['{"text":"史诗","bold":true,"color":"dark_purple"}','""','{"text":"为了打败怪物，祖先们曾在这处岛屿锻造了","italic":false,"color":"#FFF7CC"}','{"text":"这把结界之剑。","italic":false,"color":"#FFF7CC"}','{"text":"它被祖先遗留在这里，","italic":false,"color":"#FFF7CC"}','{"text":"等待后人的使用。","italic":false,"color":"#FFF7CC"}','""','{"text":"装备属性：","italic":false,"color":"dark_green"}','{"text":"+9 攻击力","italic":false,"color":"dark_green"}','{"text":"1.6 攻击速度","italic":false,"color":"#c4c40a"}','{"text":"耐久无法修复","bold":true,"color":"red"}','""','{"text":"技能：结界","italic":false,"color":"#19FFB2","bold":true}','[{"text": "持在主手按【","color": "white","bold": true,"italic": false},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand"},"】触发"]','{"text":"在身边5格范围内筑起结界，","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua"}','{"text":"使其内的怪物每秒","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua"}','[{"text":"扣除2点生命值","color":"light_purple","italic":false,"bold":true},{"text":"，且获得","bold":false,"color":"dark_aqua"}]','[{"text":"10秒","bold":true,"color":"light_purple","italic":false},{"text":"的","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false},"中毒I",{"text":"效果","color":"dark_aqua","bold":false}]','{"text":"结界维持10秒","italic":false,"color":"#FF33FF"}','{"text":"冷却：2分钟","color":"yellow","bold":true}']},HideFlags:2,cannot_fix:1b}
